name: vk-booking-manager
description: Booking and scheduling manager tailored for multi-staff service providers.

scripts.build: wp-scripts build && npm run build:css && npm run build:i18n
scripts.build:free: node bin/switch-resource-config-dev.js free && npm run build
scripts.build:pro: node bin/switch-resource-config-dev.js pro && npm run build
scripts.build:i18n: wp i18n make-pot . languages/vk-booking-manager.pot --include="src,assets,build/blocks" --exclude="dist,node_modules,vendor,build/**/*.map,build/**/*.asset.php" && msgmerge --update languages/vk-booking-manager-ja.po languages/vk-booking-manager.pot && msgfmt -o languages/vk-booking-manager-ja.mo languages/vk-booking-manager-ja.po && wp i18n make-json languages/vk-booking-manager-ja.po
scripts.phpunit: wp-env run tests-cli --env-cwd='wp-content/plugins/vk-booking-manager' sh -c 'composer install && wp db query "CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS wordpress_test" >/dev/null 2>&1 || true && vendor/bin/phpunit -c phpunit.xml.dist'
scripts.dist:stage:free: mkdir -p dist/vk-booking-manager && rsync -a --delete --exclude='.git' --exclude='.github' --exclude='.vscode' --exclude='bin' --exclude='node_modules' --exclude='dist' --exclude='docs' --exclude='.wordpress-env' --exclude='.idea' --exclude='.DS_Store' --exclude='*.zip' --exclude='vendor' --exclude='tests' --exclude='test' ./ dist/vk-booking-manager && cd dist/vk-booking-manager && composer install --no-dev --prefer-dist --no-interaction --no-progress --optimize-autoloader && cd ../.. && node bin/switch-resource-config.js free
scripts.dist:stage:pro: mkdir -p dist/vk-booking-manager-pro && rsync -a --delete --exclude='.git' --exclude='.github' --exclude='.vscode' --exclude='bin' --exclude='node_modules' --exclude='dist' --exclude='docs' --exclude='.wordpress-env' --exclude='.idea' --exclude='.DS_Store' --exclude='*.zip' --exclude='vendor' --exclude='tests' --exclude='test' ./ dist/vk-booking-manager-pro && cd dist/vk-booking-manager-pro && composer install --no-dev --prefer-dist --no-interaction --no-progress --optimize-autoloader && cd ../.. && node bin/switch-resource-config.js pro vk-booking-manager-pro
scripts.dist:all: npm run dist:prepare && npm-run-all -s dist:stage:free dist:stage:pro
scripts.dist:free: npm run dist:prepare && npm run dist:stage:free
scripts.dist:pro: npm run dist:prepare && npm run dist:stage:pro
scripts.zip:free: npm run dist:free && npm run zip:free:from-dist
scripts.zip:pro: npm run dist:pro && npm run zip:pro:from-dist
scripts.zip:free:from-dist: cd dist && rm -f vk-booking-manager.zip && zip -qr vk-booking-manager.zip vk-booking-manager
scripts.zip:pro:from-dist: cd dist && rm -f vk-booking-manager-pro.zip && zip -qr vk-booking-manager-pro.zip vk-booking-manager-pro
scripts.zip:all: npm run dist:all && npm-run-all -s zip:free:from-dist zip:pro:from-dist
